name: .ATT File Extension
summary: Learn about .ATT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Web forms when users submit data in a Web browser; contains contents from a Web form that have been emailed to the designated recipient; attached to email messages with the filename postdata.att.

content: ATT files are commonly received via email when the form encoding type is incorrect. For example, the encoding type (enctype) may be "text" instead of "text/plain."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
